name: Cosmic Crush
description:
These fearless space pilots will do whatever it takes to help you destroy enemy ships in your path, and their adventures have no limits! Cosmic Crush is a top down shooter set in a very sexy system, not too far from our own. Explore the Crush Alpha System while searching for clues to uncover secrets about the evil Cyberblock Initiative. Jump into perfect space dates for some casual bullet hell action with lots of visual incentive from our favorite girls!






  • Chloe StarlightChloe is such a smart-ass! Top of her class, even though she's only 5 feet tall, Chloe gets excited every time you hit an enemy!
  • Mia SoryuMia is a great copilot, one of the best in the galaxy! She's even part of the Cosmic Crush Space Force!
  • Holly StarrHolly is Chloe's step-sister, and an amazing investigator. Holly is fun, but takes her job as an assistant to Daisy Farcloud very seriously.
  • Sarah CelesteSarah is a Princess from a distant system! She's very proud of the Celestians, and loves to visit the Crush Alpha Systems.
  • Daisy FarcloudDaisy is the CEO of a famous Space Shipping company, and a very talented pilot. She's gonna do whatever it takes to protect her business.
